name: A Peace of Space
description:
Created for Wowie game jam #3

You are a Spaceman that was working with ground control on an unknown mission. Communications and other functions were busted by a debris storm. Your first task is to fix your communications then work with ground control to complete your mission!

  • WASD to rotate the player and move the camera around.
  • Arrow keys to move the player forward, backward, left, and right.
  • E and Q to interact.
  • Space to go through text. 

Tried to fit the theme 'Failure is Progress' with a little story where mission failure could be seen as progress and mission success could be seen as not progress. 

  • Music - https://freesound.org/people/bone666138/sounds/537732/
  • Movement Sounds - https://freesound.org/people/prod.astri/sounds/492850
  • Thumps - https://freesound.org/people/egomassive/sounds/536789/
  • Text sound - https://freesound.org/people/fastson/sounds/75188/
  • Fixing sound - https://freesound.org/people/Satoration/sounds/54970/
  • Static sound - https://freesound.org/people/VonKrapFamily/sounds/560012/
  • Rocket Sound - https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/413187/
